NPC.name: Roberta
NPC.description: Five foot of confidently swaggering catgirl, peach coloured ears sit amidst auburn blonde hair and a smirk rests on her lips. She's dressed in a fairly typical piratical regalia, her ruffled and buttoned top under a dark blue shoulder mantle that's matched by the colour of her skirts and contrasts greatly with her tail, which of course matches her ears. She has a pair of plasma pistols to hand and tall leather boots to complete her ensemble.
